patthana23.45:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.45:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.45:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
